programme.desc: Tagann Kate, iníon Dorothy, go Miami agus scéal mór aici; tá sí le coslia a phósadh. (Dorothy's daughter, Kate, comes to Miami with an announcement: she's engaged to a podiatrist.)

programme.title: Murder, She Wrote
programme.desc: Ligeann Jessica uirthi féin gur hipeacoindreach saibhir í le go mbeidh sí in ann dúnmharú a fhiosrú. (Jessica poses as a wealthy hypochondriac to investigate a murder.)

programme.title: Opry le Daniel ar Thuras
programme.desc: Fillfidh Daniel ar Fhóram na Mílaoise i nDoire chun 'Opry le Daniel ar Thuras a chur i láthair. (Daniel O'Donnell returns to the Millennium Forum in Derry to present 'Opry le Daniel ar Thuras'.)

programme.title: Grand Tours of the Scottish Islands
programme.desc: Beidh maithe agus móruaisle an cheoil ar stáitse i dTeach na Céibhe le scoth na n-amhrán. (The best selection of songs from the 11th instalment of the country music series.)
